data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during RUBY cruise from Plymouth to St. Helena started at 1800-02-19

Ship: Ruby (3rd Rate Frigate), Voyage: Plymouth - St Helena, 1st Observer: Solomon Ferris (Captain), 2nd Observer: George Forbes (2nd Officer/Lieutenant), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 64G 1369BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
